summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to funding transportation capital projects; decreasing certain appropriations from the Galer Street and Arterial City Street Funds; re-appropriating from the Galer Street Fund for various transportation projects; authorizing the use of the proceeds of bonds authorized by Ordinance 118528 for those other transportation purposes; increasing the 2000 budget of Seattle Transportation; re-naming the Galer Street Fund; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
